incident_updates.body: Start time : 13/04/2022 11:00 UTC End time : 15/04/2022 01:00 Service impact : None Service improvement : Water manifold replacement
Start time : 13/04/2022 20:00 UTC End time : 14/04/2022 03:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Upgrade all SDAGG Bart in order to have a homogeneous park.

Start time : 13/04/2022 23:30 UTC End time : 14/04/2022 02:30 UTC Service impact : VoIP will be unreachable during the maintenance. Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to upgrade a peering box router version.
Start time : 14/04/2022 01:00 UTC End time : 14/04/2022 04:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Upgrade TOR Switch for a homogeneous infrastructure

Start time : 14/04/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 14/04/2022 14:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to check UPS batteries and replace used or damaged ones

Start time : 14/04/2022 08:00 UTC End time : 14/04/2022 23:59 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Upgrade all SDAGG Bart in order to have a homogeneous park.
Due to an imponderable we have to reschedule the intervention for the following dates: Start time : 17/04/2022 22:00 UTC End time : 18/04/2022 04:00 UTC
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.
